articles.title: How the Mayans were able to accurately predict solar eclipses for centuries - Phys.org
articles.description: The Maya Civilization, from Central America, was one of the most advanced ancient civilizations, known for its significant achievements in astronomy and mathematics. This includes accurate calendars and detailed celestial records, but scientists don't fully u…
